Content: Elon , I'd like to chat with you in the next day or so ... I do think we need another Twitter
Any interest in participating in the Twitter deal ?

Roughly what dollar size ? Not holding you to anything , but the deal is oversubscribed , so I
have to reduce or kick out some participants .
A billion ... or whatever you recommend

Whatever works for you . I'd recommend maybe $ 2B or more . This has very high potential and
I'd rather have you than anyone else .
I agree that it has huge potential ... and it would be lots of fun
Since you think I should come in for at least $ 2B ... I'm in for $ 2B
